title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.10 - Tar pumping equipment-waterless holders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.10 - Tar pumping equipment-waterless holders

State Regulations

Tar and skimmer pumps, including electrical equipment, tar
conditioners and tar pipe lines shall be inspected at least once a week for
necessary repairs and adjustments. Riser pump run indicators, switches, float
rods, and gears of timing device shall be examined and inspected daily. Emergency drives for pumps shall be tested at least once a month to insure
immediate availability for service. Records of pump runs shall be taken at
least once a day. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
256.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
